description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Jun-15 08:03:33

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

ImpactId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented for every impact detected by the telemetry device. This ID uniquely defines an impact for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

AccelRaw_SegmentId.description: Units: Count. Specifies the segment number of Accelerometer raw data recorded against an impact occurrence. Segment ID is needed when the entire set of vector sample points do not fit within the limits of one event. Segment number is zero based, so the first segment has a segment ID of zero.

AccelRaw_Units.description: Specifies the units for the array of acceleration vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence.

AccelRaw_SamplingPeriod.description: Units: 10^-6 Seconds/bit (microseconds). Specifies the period between acceleration vector sample points.

AccelRaw_Samples.description: Units: direction vector. An array of acceleration vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence. The array must be ordered as contiguous vector points with X component, followed by Y component followed by Z component.

GyroRaw_Units.description: Specifies the units for the array of gyro vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence.

GyroRaw_Samples.description: Units: direction vector. An array of gyro vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence. The array must be ordered as contiguous vector points with X component, followed by Y component followed by Z component.
